item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. If you need the money, don't take the job (48 points | 17 comments)
2. Speed, scale and reliability: 25 years of Google datacenter networking evolution (129 points | 20 comments)
3. Venvstacks: Virtual Environment Stacks for Python (31 points | 9 comments)
4. Unix core utilities implemented in Haskell (37 points | 2 comments)
5. The motor turns too much (311 points | 138 comments)
6. Get me out of data hell (426 points | 148 comments)
7. Ractor – a Rust Actor Framework (77 points | 30 comments)
8. Eighty Years of the Finite Element Method (2022) (163 points | 83 comments)
9. Next Generation Out of Band Garbage Collection (129 points | 66 comments)
10. Weird Lexical Syntax (384 points | 188 comments)
11. Saving historic cruise ships (32 points | 37 comments)
12. Spann: Highly-Efficient Billion-Scale Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search (2021) (94 points | 25 comments)
13. SpawELO – small free matchmaking system for LAN parties (152 points | 34 comments)
14. Show HN: A minimalist (brutalist?) website for sharing all your links (247 points | 131 comments)
15. Show HN: Someday, Open-Source Calendly Alternative for Gmail / Google App Script (262 points | 44 comments)
16. The inventor of the automatic rice cooker (173 points | 149 comments)
17. Create block devices on your computer backed by Redstone Memory (3 points | discuss)
18. Sortledton: A Universal, Transactional Graph Data Structure [pdf] (80 points | 11 comments)
19. Hacking the T2S+ Out of Fear: Get Lock-In Thermography for Free (258 points | 36 comments)
20. Repeatability: As Difficult as it is Important (28 points | 6 comments)
21. XTP: Make Squishy Software (33 points | 6 comments)
22. Prisma Postgres – Runs on bare metal and unikernels (247 points | 110 comments)
23. Boston Dynamics robot Atlas goes hands on [video] (192 points | 165 comments)
24. Cramming Solitaire onto a Nintendo E-Reader card (95 points | 39 comments)
25. Colorado scrambles to change voting-system passwords after accidental leak (179 points | 424 comments)
26. Security flaws found in all Nvidia GeForce GPUs. Update drivers ASAP (157 points | 90 comments)
27. Inspecting North Korea's Digital Map App: Licensing and API Insights (53 points | 21 comments)
28. Signal: Online MIDI Editor (137 points | 20 comments)
29. Ring-Based Mid-Air Gesture Typing System Using Deep Learning Word Prediction (52 points | 31 comments)
30. Cash: A small jQuery alternative for modern browsers (160 points | 133 comments)
